name: Frost Mole
description: The Frost Mole is a small, robust creature adept at burrowing and stealth, thriving in snowy environments.
memorable: Its ability to create pits under targets and camouflaging in snow makes it a unique ambusher.
goals: To use its environment effectively to catch foes off guard.
relations: May be found in proximity to other cold-adapted creatures.
strengths: Good physical resilience and stealth capabilities.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, predictable in social situations.
attacks: Claw attack that deals 8 slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Snow Pit allows for tactical ambushes by trapping foes.
senses: Blindsight allows it to detect nearby threats without relying on sight.
skills: Good at athletics and stealth, capable of effective climbing and hiding.
additional_information: Advantage on perception checks relying on smell.
Can burrow through snow and ice easily.
Advantage on stealth checks in snowy terrain.
test_queries: small ambush creature in snowy environments
stealthy mole that digs traps in snow
creature with keen sense of smell in cold
